title: Deck Builder
descriptionA: Access to a wide library of cards
descriptionB: A deck building application that allows users to search for cards and add them to their deck. Users can also create an account, save their decks, and view other users decks.

title: Collection Tracker
descriptionA: Track and manage your card collection
Value estimation based on market trends
descriptionB: A collection tracker application that allows users to search for cards and add them to their collection. Users can also create an account, save their collection, and view other users collections.

title: Store
descriptionA: Sell and buy cards with ease
descriptionB: A store application that allows users to search for cards and add them to their cart. Users can also create an account, save their cart, and view other users carts.
